meanings.definition: The act, process, or result of making or becoming pure.
meanings.sent1: The ure of the water involved removing all impurities.
meanings.sent2: She achieved the ure of her intentions through hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent3: The ure of the cake was evident in its delicious taste.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was the ure that shone through in his actions.
meanings.sent5: The ure of the sunrise painted the sky in vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: A suffix meaning 'act, process, or result of.'
meanings.sent1: The closure of the store was due to the fail-ure of sales.
meanings.sent2: The capt-ure of the criminal was a relief to the community.
meanings.sent3: The depart-ure of the train was delayed by mechanical issues.
meanings.sent4: The expos-ure of the truth brought clarity to the situation.
meanings.sent5: The struct-ure of the building was carefully planned and executed.
